name: prettier-trivago-import-sorter
description: Prettier Trivago Import Sorter is a VS Code extension that organizes your import statements according to the Trivago style guide. Enhance your code readability and maintain consistency across your projects with this easy-to-use extension. Perfect for developers who use Prettier and want to keep their import statements neat and orderly.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
